name: sonigraph
description: An Obsidian plugin that transforms the visual structure of your knowledge graph into music.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run build:css -- --no-fail-on-lint
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp main.js styles.css manifest.json /mnt/d/Vaults/Banister/.obsidian/plugins/sonigraph/ && echo 'âœ… Deployed to vault! Reload Obsidian (Ctrl+R) to see changes.'

author: John Banister
